description: Enterprise techniques used by SHOTPUT, ATT&CK software S0063 v1.1
name: SHOTPUT (S0063)

techniques.comment: SHOTPUT has a command to retrieve information about connected users.[2]
SHOTPUT has a command to obtain a directory listing.[2]
SHOTPUT is obscured using XOR encoding and appended to a valid GIF file.[1][2]
SHOTPUT has a command to obtain a process listing.[2]
SHOTPUT has a command to list all servers in the domain, as well as one to locate domain controllers on a domain.[2]
SHOTPUT uses netstat to list TCP connection status.[2]
